= Installation =

Currently source code and Windows binary packages are available. People are welcome to package it under various kinds of Unix and Linux distribution and submit them here. Please refer to `README` file on how to compile and install it under Linux/Unix.

== Windows packages ==

Since 0.5.1, Windows binaries are always distributed along with all necessary libraries. The libraries are copied from newest version of [http://gladewin32.sourceforge.net/ Glade for Windows project]. No installation is necessary; just extract the archive into any folder and it should work. However, note that this is a command line application.
